text:
@realDonaldTrump Unless it's your resignation, no one wants to hear you spewing a cesspool of racist and misogynistic garbage that gaslights the nation and emboldens your racist GOP base.

You're a treasonweasel who has killed 130,000+ Americans with your failed covid19 response.
